dlentry.dt: The Hadoop FS origin has an error icon with the following message:

dd.codeblock: Validation_0071 - Stage '<stage id>' does not support 'Standalone' execution mode

dlentry.dd: You can use the Hadoop FS origin in cluster mode pipelines.
Workaround: In the pipeline properties, set the Execution Mode to Cluster. Or if you want to run the pipeline in standalone mode, use the Directory or File Tail origins to process file data.
